h3.span: Acme Teacher of the Month Sept 2019

div.p: The mission of Chichester School District is to provide an education in a safe environment for students to achieve individual academic success, develop personal and civic responsibility, and acquire college and career readiness skills for an evolving and diverse world.

div.b: No Faculty or Staff are listed at this time.
